Sql.CDATA:
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [DeltaFileSOOrder] AS select so.OrderType, so.OrderNbr, ulf.FileID, ulf.Name, dfd.Category, dfd.Summary
from SOOrder so JOIN NoteDoc on NoteDoc.NoteID = so.NoteID JOIN UploadFile ulf on ulf.FileID = NoteDoc.FileID LEFT JOIN DeltaFileDetails dfd on dfd.FileID = ulf.FileID GO
